name: Steven Dirven
content: Simon has been an exemplary full-stack developer at Shape Technology, leading frontend development, DevOps, and CI/CD pipelines. Skilled in TypeScript, Angular, C#, .NET Core, and MySQL, he excels at maintaining code, implementing features, and documenting best practices. A continuous learner and dedicated team player, Simon is a valuable asset to any development team.

name: Luke Wang
content: Collaborating with Simon has been a pleasure with his excellent communication and attention to detail. Alongside being a wonderful person, Simon consistently delivers front-end features that solve key workflow issues within our team. The usability and quality of his work has only improved during the time we worked together. I am confident that Simon's remarkable work ethic will continue throughout his career.
